name: Painful Evolution
text: When you control either "Yubel" or "Yubel - Terror Incarnate", you can choose 1 of the following: ● Send 1 "Yubel" you control to the Graveyard to play "Yubel - Terror Incarnate" from your hand. ● Send 1 "Yubel - Terror Incarnate" you control to the Graveyard to play "Yubel - The Ultimate Nightmare" from your hand. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
